title: Contributing to MolEvolvR
text: Fork package clone onto computer. havenâ€™t done , recommend using usethis. Install load usethis package : Clone fork MolEvolvR package using: Install BiocManager Bioconductor: Install development dependencies ensure package passes R CMD check using devtools: R CMD check doesnâ€™t pass cleanly, â€™s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using: Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number.
code: install.packages("usethis")  library("usethis") usethis::create_from_github("JRaviLab/MolEvolvR", fork = TRUE) if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))     install.packages("BiocManager") BiocManager::install(version = "3.19") install.packages("devtools")  library("devtools")  devtools::install_dev_deps()  devtools::check() usethis::pr_init("brief-description-of-change")

DomArch: domain architecture entry. Lineage: lineage associated entry. count: total number occurrences combination GenContext, DomArch, Lineage. results arranged descending order count.
